name: Try To Fly (itch)
description:
In this rage game, you play as Tsuru - a paper crane who dreams of flying.

Jump your way through various blocks (be careful of wind zones & falling raindrops) and see what's waiting for you at the top!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Too frustrated? You can enter these cheat codes to aid Tsuru on his quest.
Be warned, though - as these can make the game a bit boring.

1.) "origami"   (~25% progress skip)
2.) "foldme"    (~55%  progress skip)
3.) "notabird"  (~80% progress skip)
